items.title: getElementByID()
items.description: Selects an element by its 'id' attribute.

items.title: getElementsByTagName()
items.description: Selects all elements of a specific HTML 'tag' type

items.title: getElementsByClassName()
items.description: Selects all elements that have a specific 'class'.

items.title: querySelector()
items.description: Selects the first element that matches a specified CSS selector.

items.title: querySelectorAll()
items.description: Selects all elements that match a specified CSS selector
